name: Projector Screen Simulator
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Projector.
Projector Screen Simulator - a game simulator joke where you can play as a phone with projector for theater! Take a photo or Selfie yourself and your friends! Start the projector and you're here to get yourself on the screen in a movie!
There is a different pattern for the self and photos!
Raffle friends and show them your picture on the projector!
Take a photo of yourself and send it to the projector! Try yourself as a film director! Shoot footage for his film! Make a New Year or Christmas Selfie!
The projector is only the simulator!
The application is built for fun and draw!
Thank you for playing our games! Leave feedback to the app! And we will make them even better!
